documents.document: I've got a 12 hour flight from NZ to SF for GDC in a month's time. Gonna be weird to see what Trump messes with before and after that.
@DanRyckert Cheers. Sending something rad your way!
@DanRyckert Hey man, what's the address for GBEast? Keen to send something to you guys.
Is there an official list somewhere to get the addresses for Giant Bomb & Giant Bomb East's addresses?

Oi @SEGA, Solid work on classic soundtracks on Spotify! May I suggest Streets of Rage & Ristar next? @yuzokoshiro
I'm trying to find where i would buy a poster tube to send stuff in the mail in Wellington but the post shop doesn't have any. Any ideas?
@lucyamorris It's basically all that. I'll get Neli to add you to the list :P
Also some peeps at work have started a 5 min stretch session twice a day, really helps out.
However based on previous mass excercise, i will get terribly sick within the next few weeks, ruining everything :P

Also fun finding out stuff i've missed out on in betas and stuff, plus messingn with a ton of emulators for cool stuff like textures, etc.
With @gameartarchive and @OldGameMags their content is set. While for @Sonic_Hedgeblog it's shuffled every day after i add more stuff to it
Running @Sonic_Hedgeblog is real fun, mostly due to my not knowing what'll be posted up the next day despite a huge queue.

Also, "1, 2 Switch" and Arms almost unsold me on the system. I don't want that garbage. Nothing showed this thing as a portable hybrid.
I'm in for Splatoon 2. Not sure on Zelda. I skipped Skyward Sword too.
I don't even like that stuff in that last Paper Mario Game. Mario has it's own style. Don't copy the wacky-japanese stuff.
To reiterate: I'm keen for a new Mario game, but fuuuuuuuuuck that "realistic" bullshit.
I'm keen for a new Bomberman but never liked the round-head-Bomberman style.
